list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: Remove unnecessary comments
This commit removes unnecessary comments from the codebase. These comments were either redundant, outdated, or did not provide sufficient value to justify their presence. Removing them improves code readability and reduces visual clutter.

initial commit: Set up the first working version

fix(dev): Ensure worker threads run in dev mode
Worker threads were not being properly initialized in development mode, leading to unexpected behavior and errors. This commit corrects the initialization process to ensure that worker threads function as expected during development. This resolves issues where certain features relying on worker threads were not functioning correctly in the development environment.

fix(progressbar): Truncate long file names to prevent progress bar jitter
Long file names were causing the progress bar to jitter or jump around during updates. This commit truncates long file names before displaying them in the progress bar, ensuring that the progress bar remains stable and animates smoothly in the same position. This improves the user experience by providing a more visually appealing and less distracting progress indicator.

chore(dev-script): Add cross-platform dev script
This commit adds a development script using `cross-env` to ensure consistent execution in development environments across both Windows and Unix-like operating systems. This simplifies the development process and eliminates potential cross-platform compatibility issues related to environment variable handling.

chore: Remove unnecessary comments
This commit removes unnecessary comments from the codebase. These comments were either redundant, outdated, or did not provide sufficient value to justify their presence. Removing them improves code readability and reduces visual clutter.

feat: Add interactive delete module
Adds interactive delete module to allow user to delete interactively by selecting the files they deem as unwanted

fix: Prevent app crashing because of syntax error
Prevents the app from crashing due to syntax error caused during conflict resolution.
ci: Enable CI workflow

test: Add unit tests
Adds unit tests for `DuplicateFileDeleterFactory` and `ErrorHandler` classes

test: Add unit test for directory traverser
Adds unit tests for `Directory Traverser`

test: Update unit test for directory traverser
Updates unit tests for `Directory Traverser` to test related to flows where files and folders could not be accessed

MESSAGE.value: initial commit: Setup the first working version

initial commit: Set up the first working version
Signed-off-by: Vijaykoushik Sekar <vijaykoushik@blaze.ws>
initial commit: Set up the first working version

fix(dev): Ensure worker threads run in dev mode
Worker threads were not being properly initialized in development mode, leading to unexpected behavior and errors. This commit corrects the initialization process to ensure that worker threads function as expected during development. This resolves issues where certain features relying on worker threads were not functioning correctly in the development environment.

fix(progressbar): Truncate long file names to prevent progress bar jitter
Long file names were causing the progress bar to jitter or jump around during updates. This commit truncates long file names before displaying them in the progress bar, ensuring that the progress bar remains stable and animates smoothly in the same position. This improves the user experience by providing a more visually appealing and less distracting progress indicator.

chore(dev-script): Add cross-platform dev script
This commit adds a development script using `cross-env` to ensure consistent execution in development environments across both Windows and Unix-like operating systems. This simplifies the development process and eliminates potential cross-platform compatibility issues related to environment variable handling.

chore: Remove unnecessary comments
This commit removes unnecessary comments from the codebase. These comments were either redundant, outdated, or did not provide sufficient value to justify their presence. Removing them improves code readability and reduces visual clutter.

ci: Integrate Prettier, Husky, and lint-staged
This commit integrates Prettier, Husky, and lint-staged into the project's CI/CD pipeline. Prettier will automatically format code, Husky will enable Git hooks to run checks before commits, and lint-staged will ensure that only staged files are checked. This improves code quality, consistency, and streamlines the development workflow.

feat: Add interactive delete module
Adds interactive delete module to allow user to delete interactively by selecting the files they deem as unwanted

fix: Prevent app crashing because of syntax error
Prevents the app from crashing due to syntax error caused during conflict resolution.

test: Add unit tests
Adds unit tests for `DuplicateFileDeleterFactory` and `ErrorHandler` classes

test: Add unit test for directory traverser
Adds unit tests for `Directory Traverser`

test: Update unit test for directory traverser
Updates unit tests for `Directory Traverser` to test related to flows where files and folders could not be accessed
